job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and potentially integrating new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system, a core software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period on multiple products indicates a need for quick learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating that the candidate must be able to unblock themselves.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's an element of AI model improvement (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on the application and integration of AI within a broader system (1.A.1), rather than deep model development or specialization. The role is about supporting and enhancing an AI-augmented system, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The distinction between core AI development and applying AI in a support function is reasonably clear. However, the ad is brief and lacks specific technical details, which prevents a perfect score.
